xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 3 Vedanāttika » 3.1 Paṭiccavāra » 3.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Nahetuduka
Dasaka
Vedanāttika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
Dasaka
1863Nahetupaccayā naadhipatipaccayā…pe…  nakammapaccayā navipākapaccayā namaggapaccayā navippayuttapaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1864Nahetumūlakaṃ.
<< Sattakaup Naadhipatiduka >>
